page.title: 13ULLAPOOL-A PRIMARY SCHOOLDAY
page.content: At 9.10 pm.the bell rings and we all go to our classrooms for registration. We say the Lord's Prayer and then we start working at Mathematics until the first break at 10.35 am. After the 10 minute break we have Language Arts (listening,speaking, reading and writing) until lunchtime. Some pupils have school lunch,packed lunch and others go home at 12.05 pm. School restarts at 1.05 pm.and we work at several subjects,such as Environmental Studies (Geography, History and Science),Music,Art, Handicrafts and Religious Education. Each week we also have Physical Education,playing rugby,football, basketball,cricket,rounders or have gymnastics in the school gymnasium. Every June the whole school has a Sports Day on the school field.
